TEXT.TITLE: EXECUTIVE TELECOM <XTEL> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Executive Telecommunications Inc said its board has extended the exercise date of its warrants to December 31 from March 31. Each allows the purchase of one common share at 1.50 dlrs. Reuter
